description: Aleksei caught his boyfriend cheating on him. And apparently they cheated on him in his own bed. That's a low blow. So Aleksei decided not to get mad but to get even. And he didn't go out and find some random trick, no, he chose the same guy his boyfriend used! Yeah. Interesting angle, huh? Well aside from the reasons, the dude is hot, that is enough in and of itself. Watch a hot dude suck off another hot and get creamed in the face.
title: So Long
